channel.title: I need help for summoning
channel.description:
I have downloaded great source and there is summoning but it's not real summoning. I only can train it for cliking box and i get summoning xp lol ! So i need something guide how i add real summoning skill.
thanks!

item.title: I need help for summoning
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

have you tried using the search button? cuz i dont think its that easy to make it for someone to just reply this and type a whole guide. but you might get lucky and someone might direct you to a guide, if not goodluck =\

Read full topic
